topic.title: Open Document with Template and Document Templates Dialog

section.p: The Choose Document Template Dialog is called by selecting Document Open with Document Template... and choosing which file to open. The dialog allows you to manually specify what parameters you want to open the document with.

li.b: Open the document with a different encoding
li.p: Just click the Details... button and change the encoding.

li.b: Open the document with metadata specified by one of the existing templates
Open the document with manually specified metadata
li.p: Click on the template category that best fits your document (e.g XHTML ), or click Default if there are none. Then click the Details... button to specify the metadata manually.
